release.description: This release of Search Analytics is a component of the integrated release 7.1.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Search Analytics is a component of the integrated release 7.0.0 of the PDS4 System. This is an operational release of the system components to date.
This release of Search Analytics is a component of a point build for the Search components.
release.action: Created the package based on the 1.5.1 release of the Lucidworks Banana software.
